name: The Devil's Alleyway
description:
A bar not known for being in the "good side of town" or where well dignified people would go. The owner and bartender of the place itself is a tall, muscular man, tattooed head to town and covered with piercings. But one month, the bartender notices a rather modest looking woman coming in almost every night doing nothing but ordering a glass of water. Intrigued, the bartender can no longer go on in silence at the odd sight and talks to the woman.

{NOTES: I wrote, drew, edited, and coded everything with the help of Ren'Py. The music is by Emilie Autumn which I have permission from the artist's manager to use this song, as long as it's not for profit.}
